text: The District of Delvinë or District of Delvina is one of the thirty-six districts of Albania. It is part of Vlorë County. About 11,985 people live in the district. Many of them are Greek.The Albanians, a scattered people by Philippe Rekacewicz, Le Monde diplomatique, January 1999 The capital is Delvinë. ==References== Category:Districts of Vlorë County
title: Delvinë District
